name: overview
headline: Overview
content:
L1-Systems supply nation quality security technologies that provide fully covered security solutions for your needs.

We provide turn key, cutting-edge technologies including: supply, installation, training, programming, design, maintence services and implementations for projects which include audio and video surveillance technologies alike.
We also have expertise in more technologies such as: jamming, fire detection, biometrics, security CCTV and more.

L1-Systems are a well known name for quality assurance and for delivering the best integrated solutions for Airports, Safe Cities, Borders, Federal Assets, Critical infrastructure, Maritime Platforms and more.

name: Surveillance Solutions
headline: Surveillance Solutions
content:
L1-Systems have a wide variety of surveillance solutions, video or audio alike.
Ranging from microphones, to CCTV cameras and up to E/O platforms - short or long range.

We specialize in integration of different surveillance equipment in order to optimize the outcome.
We find the best solution for each customer, while also ensuring that protected perimeters are completely covered at all times with real-time stream of information, video and audio.

  • CCTV cameras
  • E/O day platforms
  • E/O night platforms
